code_snippet:
def html_snapshot(
    self,
    name="",
    suffix=".html",
    encoding="utf-8",
    unique_file=True,
):
    filename = f"{name}{suffix}"

    if unique_file:
        (fd, filename) = tempfile.mkstemp(prefix=name, suffix=suffix)
        # Don't hold the file
        os.close(fd)

    with open(filename, "w", encoding=encoding) as f:
        f.write(self.html)

    return filename

mapped_sequence.description: Creates temporary file that is not deleted on close
Basic file opening operations for writing (normal writing, binary writing)
Writing data to files (strings or bytes)

pattern_analysis.contextual_code:
def html_snapshot(self, name="", suffix=".html", encoding="utf-8", unique_file=True):
    filename = f"{name}{suffix}"

    if unique_file:
        (fd, filename) = tempfile.mkstemp(prefix=name, suffix=suffix)
        os.close(fd)

    with open(filename, "w", encoding=encoding) as f:
        f.write(self.html)

    return filename
